verses.name: Numbers 20:27
verses.text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded: and they went up into mount Hor in the sight of all the congregation.

verses.name: Numbers 20:28
verses.text: And Moses stripped Aaron of his garments, and put them upon Eleazar his son; and Aaron died there in the top of the mount: and Moses and Eleazar came down from the mount.

verses.name: Numbers 20:29
verses.text: And when all the congregation saw that Aaron was dead, they mourned for Aaron thirty days, even all the house of Israel.
